data.strFullDescription:
The Witcher is a role-playing game set in a dark fantasy world where moral ambiguity reigns. Shattering the line between good and evil, the game emphasizes story and character development, while incorporating a tactically-deep, real-time combat system.

Become The Witcher, Geralt of Rivia, and get caught in a web of intrigue woven by forces vying for control of the world. Make difficult decisions and live with the consequences in a game that will immerse you in an extraordinary tale like no other.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/20900/extras/W1_2.gif?t=1721642153[/img]

[h2]KEY FEATURES[/h2]
[b]GERALT OF RIVIA: A ONE-OF-A-KIND PROTAGONIST[/b]
[list][*]Take on the role of Geralt of Rivia: a charismatic swordmaster and professional monster slayer.
[*]Choose from over 250 special abilities, combat skills and magical powers to build a character best suited to your style of play.[/list]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/20900/extras/W1_3.gif?t=1721642153[/img]

[b]ORIGINAL FANTASY WORLD DRAWN FROM LITERATURE[/b]
[list][*]Enter a harsh fantasy world inspired by the writings of renowned Polish author Andrzej Sapkowski, where nothing is truly black or white, right or wrong.[/list]

[b]NON-LINEAR STORYLINE[/b]
[list][*]Immerse yourself in an epic narrative full of turns, twists and ambiguous moral decisions which have real impact on the storyline.
[*]Accomplish quests in a variety of ways and see how the narrative culminates in one of three different endings depending on your actions.[/list]

[b]STUNNING TACTICAL ACTION[/b]
[list][*]Engage in elaborate, yet intuitive real-time combat based on real medieval sword-fighting techniques.
[*]Battle using six combat styles, dozens of potions, complex alchemy system, modifiable weapons and powerful magic which all add tactical depth to the fluid real-time experience.
[*]Motion capture performed by medieval fighting experts at Frankfurt's renowned Metric Minds studio, resulting in 600 spectacular and authentic in-game combat animations.[/list]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/20900/extras/W1_1.gif?t=1721642153[/img]


[h2]ABOUT THE WITCHER: ENHANCED EDITION[/h2]
The Witcher: Enhanced Edition takes all of the acclaimed gameplay that garnered the original game more than 90 industry awards and introduces a number of gameplay and technical improvements.
[list][*][b]Superior dialogue and cutscenes:[/b] Over 5000 rewritten and re-recorded lines of dialogue in English, completely redone German language version, as well as over 200 new gesture animations create a more consistent experience and make characters behave more believably in dialogue and cutscenes.
[*][b]Enhanced inventory:[/b] A separate sack for alchemy ingredients, as well as a simple sort-and-stack function streamline item organization and usage.
[*][b]Technical improvements:[/b] Numerous technical enhancements feature greatly reduced loading times, improved stability, combat responsiveness, faster inventory loading, an option to turn auto-saving on or off, and more.
[*][b]Character differentiation system:[/b] The system randomizes the appearance of dozens of in-game models in order to add more variety to monsters and NPCs.[/list]

The Witcher Enhanced Edition comes with these bonus items:
[list][*]An interactive comic book
[*]D'jinni Adventure Editor
[*]Two new adventures offering 5+ hours of gameplay
[*]Official Soundtrack
[*]“Music Inspired by The Witcher” album
[*]“Making of” videos
[*]Official Game Guide
[*]Two maps of The Witcher's world[/list]
